scene.title: 戦闘1
scene.text: 'one'
The girl counted the numbers silently in her head.
'Two'

text.p: Two big men approached from the left.
One of them was the man who first discovered the girl and gave the warning.
He held a sword in his hand and his face was beaming.
Just like a hunter watching it's prey fall into a trap, his smile is like telling death.

scene.text: However, Sushang was unmoved.
She cast her gaze to the right.
'Three'

text.p: The big guy on the right side wasn't in the girl’s line of sight at all.
He ran over after hearing the warning sound.

scene.text: 'Four'
The nearest bandit was only about five steps away from Sushang.
It was a muscular man with a Pudao in his hand. Among the four, he was the oldest and has the most experience in kung fu.
……the girl has only trained against her master, and has no actual combat experience.
If she did, she would've known that no matter how strong martial arts masters are, they should try their best to avoid a situation where there are more than one enemy.
And fighting alone against four well-trained sand bandits is no different from cutting one's own throat.
It’s a pity that the girl doesn’t know this kind of “common sense”, and her cool master didn’t even know anything about it that day.
So she wasn’t afraid, but excited.

mono.p: ——The sand bandits are only five steps away from her.
The girl shook the cloth bag and held the ancient sword “Xuanyuan” with her backhand.
The feeling of holding a sword in hand always made her feel at ease.
was supposed to be like this:
The girl leaped to her feet, her body astonishing graceful.
When she landed, the sword had already pierced into the man’s chest.
She drew out the sword and turned around —— the speed was so fast that the blood hadn't gushed out.
Then she held out the sword and watched the ferocious smile solidify on the man's face.
In this way, there are only two of the four enemies left —— easily.

scene.text: …… The girl conceived this script in an instant.

text.p: With her martial arts accomplishments and the benefits of the ancient sword, Xuanyuan——
it wasn’t difficult to turn this fantasy into reality.

mono.p: …… The sand bandits are four steps away from her.

scene.text: But the girl didn’t act
'…… not worthy.'
Ancient sword Xuanyuan --it wasn’t a weapon to be used to deal with this kind of opponent.

text.p: The four people in front of her didn’t even deserve to see the true face of the sword.
This sword had been handed down since ancient times when the human and gods crossed the sky, and it has gone through tens of thousands of years.
Its owner was the legend of martial arts, the only true immortal, and the guardian of Shenzhou "Immortal Empyrea"

scene.text: Twenty-nine years ago, True Celestial received an orphan girl as her last disciple in the East Shenzhou Sea, and taught her with this sword.

text.p: Taixu's seventh sword shakes the rivers and lakes in the name of Qin Suyi and 『Xuanyuan』.

After the real Celestial returned to the immortal plain, Qin Suyi couldn't retreat, and re-entered the rivers and lakes three years later. The romantic love story between her and Li Shen, "Young Master Chuan", had been passed down for a while.
Ten years ago, mother who had already retired from the Martial arts gave "Xuanyuan" to the young Sushang,
delivered them together, realize the Five Aggregates of Taixu and the expectation of becoming "No. 1 in the world".

scene.text: This was an unparalleled magic weapon, its blade is only for the strong.

text.p: How could she let the blood of the mediocre group of people in front of her contaminate the prestige of this sword?

mono.p: ——The sand bandits are three steps away from her.

scene.text: The little pride and contentment filled Sushang's heart.
'Ha, with these guys——'
——not worthy for Sushang to try the sword!
